Trade/Device Name(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max
Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max Plus
GE Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max
GE Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max Plus
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Rightest and GE Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems Max/Max Plus for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using dehydrogenase electrochemical sensor.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
